title: Keir Starmer: Ex-Rights Lawyer, Musician Set To Take Labour Back To Power
content: UK Labour leader Keir Starmer is an ex-human rights lawyer and public prosecutor who will have to focus his relentless work ethic and methodical mind to fixing the country.
summary: UK Labour leader Keir Starmer is an ex-human rights lawyer and public prosecutor who will have to focus his relentless work ethic and methodical mind to fixing the country.

title: What Does UK's Labour Want To Do?
content: Britain's Labour party, predicted to win Thursday's election, is promising a "decade of national renewal" and with a record landslide that gives the party a free reign to implement its programme.
summary: Britain's Labour party, predicted to win Thursday's election, is promising a "decade of national renewal" and with a record landslide that gives the party a free reign to implement its programme.

title: Israeli Army Officer Killed In Hezbollah Rocket Attack
content: An Israeli army officer was killed in Hezbollah rocket fire on Thursday, the Israeli military said in a press statement.
summary: An Israeli army officer was killed in Hezbollah rocket fire on Thursday, the Israeli military said in a press statement.

title: Huge Win For Labour, Historic Loss For Rishi Sunak's Party: Exit Poll
content: Keir Starmer will be Britain's next prime minister with his Labour Party set to win a massive majority in a parliamentary election, an exit poll on Thursday indicated, while Rishi Sunak's Conservatives are forecast to suffer historic losses.
summary: Keir Starmer will be Britain's next prime minister with his Labour Party set to win a massive majority in a parliamentary election, an exit poll on Thursday indicated, while Rishi Sunak's Conservatives are forecast to suffer historic losses.

title: US Sees "Significant Opening" In Israel-Hamas Hostage Talks: Official
content: The United States believes Israel and Hamas have a "pretty significant opening" to reach an agreement on a ceasefire in Gaza and the release of hostages held there, a senior US official said Thursday.
summary: The United States believes Israel and Hamas have a "pretty significant opening" to reach an agreement on a ceasefire in Gaza and the release of hostages held there, a senior US official said Thursday.

title: Pakistan To Host SCO Meeting In October 2024: Foreign Office
content: Pakistan on Thursday said it would host the SCO Heads of Government meeting in October and invite all heads of government of the member states of the grouping.
summary: Pakistan on Thursday said it would host the SCO Heads of Government meeting in October and invite all heads of government of the member states of the grouping.

title: Who Is Keir Starmer, Rishi Sunak's Opponent Pegged To Be Next UK PM
content: In May 2024, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak made a surprise snap election announcement. Now, the UK will vote on July 4 and the focus, apart from the Prime Minister's Conservative Party, is on Keir Starmer, the Labour Party's candidate.
summary: In May 2024, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak made a surprise snap election announcement. Now, the UK will vote on July 4 and the focus, apart from the Prime Minister's Conservative Party, is on Keir Starmer, the Labour Party's candidate.

title: Israel To Send Delegation For Gaza Hostage Negotiations: Netanyahu
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced Thursday he has agreed to send a delegation for talks on securing the release of hostages seized in the October 7 attacks.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced Thursday he has agreed to send a delegation for talks on securing the release of hostages seized in the October 7 attacks.

title: Israel Okays New Payment Of Over $140 Million To Palestinian Authority
content: Israel has approved a new payment of more than $140 million to the Palestinian Authority after announcing it had also unblocked some funds frozen because of the Gaza war, a finance ministry spokesperson told AFP on Thursday.
summary: Israel has approved a new payment of more than $140 million to the Palestinian Authority after announcing it had also unblocked some funds frozen because of the Gaza war, a finance ministry spokesperson told AFP on Thursday.

title: Putin Says He Takes Trump's Comments On Ending Ukraine War "Seriously"
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that he took seriously US presidential candidate Donald Trump's comments that he could bring about a quick end to the fighting in Ukraine.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that he took seriously US presidential candidate Donald Trump's comments that he could bring about a quick end to the fighting in Ukraine.

title: Iran Sentences Woman Labour Activist To Death For Links To Banned Group
content: Iranian authorities Thursday sentenced to death a woman labour activist on charges of links to an outlawed Kurdish organisation, rights groups said.
summary: Iranian authorities Thursday sentenced to death a woman labour activist on charges of links to an outlawed Kurdish organisation, rights groups said.

title: Gaza Church Opens Doors To Injured, Sick As Hospitals Fill Amid Raging War
content: St. Philip's church once offered a haven of devotion to Gaza's small Christian community. After nine months of Israeli military action that has devastated the Palestinian enclave's health system, priests have turned it into a hospital.
summary: St. Philip's church once offered a haven of devotion to Gaza's small Christian community. After nine months of Israeli military action that has devastated the Palestinian enclave's health system, priests have turned it into a hospital.

title: UK Teacher Had Sex With Teens, Gave Birth To Baby, Jailed For 6 Years
content: A British teacher who hadsexwith two teenage students and had a baby with one of them was sentenced Thursday to six and a half years in jail.
summary: A British teacher who hadsexwith two teenage students and had a baby with one of them was sentenced Thursday to six and a half years in jail.

title: Russia Jails US Citizen After Finding Him Guilty Of Trying To Sell Drugs
content: A Russian court on Thursday sentenced U.S. citizen Robert Romanov Woodland to 12-1/2 years in a maximum security penal colony after finding him guilty of attempting to sell drugs, Woodland's lawyer and Moscow prosecutors said.
summary: A Russian court on Thursday sentenced U.S. citizen Robert Romanov Woodland to 12-1/2 years in a maximum security penal colony after finding him guilty of attempting to sell drugs, Woodland's lawyer and Moscow prosecutors said.

title: Developing Chabahar Port "De-Risks" Commerce Between India, Eurasia: PM
content: The progress made by India in developing Iran's Chabahar Port not only holds "great value" to landlocked Central Asian states but also "de-risks" commerce between India and Eurasia, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Thursday.
summary: The progress made by India in developing Iran's Chabahar Port not only holds "great value" to landlocked Central Asian states but also "de-risks" commerce between India and Eurasia, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Thursday.

title: UK Woman Murdered Parents, Lived With Their Dead Bodies For Several Years
content: The woman lied to the doctors and relatives that her parents were unwell, on holiday or on vacation to cover her tracks.
summary: The woman lied to the doctors and relatives that her parents were unwell, on holiday or on vacation to cover her tracks.

title: French Far Right May Fall Short Of Absolute Majority, Opinion Poll Shows
content: France's far-right National Rally (RN) party is expected to fall short of an absolute majority in the second round of parliamentary elections on Sunday, an opinion poll showed on Thursday.
summary: France's far-right National Rally (RN) party is expected to fall short of an absolute majority in the second round of parliamentary elections on Sunday, an opinion poll showed on Thursday.

title: LIVE - Win For Keir Starmer's Labour In First Result Of UK Poll
content: UK Election Results 2024 LIVE Updates: The United Kingdom is on the brink of a significant political shift as the country voted in a parliamentary election on July 4 that is expected to bring Keir Starmer's Labour Party to power.
summary: UK Election Results 2024 LIVE Updates: The United Kingdom is on the brink of a significant political shift as the country voted in a parliamentary election on July 4 that is expected to bring Keir Starmer's Labour Party to power.

title: Indian Community Says Labour Will Win, But Praise Sunak's Performance
content: As the voting for snap general elections began on Thursday, the Indian community in the United Kingdom expressed confidence that the Labour Party would end the nearly 15-year stint of the Conservatives.
summary: As the voting for snap general elections began on Thursday, the Indian community in the United Kingdom expressed confidence that the Labour Party would end the nearly 15-year stint of the Conservatives.

title: "Make In India Can Add To Engines Of Global Growth": PM Modi At SCO Summit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said the 'Make in India' initiative can add to engines of global growth and help democratise the global economy, and highlighted the importance of creating multiple, reliable and resilient supply chains.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said the 'Make in India' initiative can add to engines of global growth and help democratise the global economy, and highlighted the importance of creating multiple, reliable and resilient supply chains.
